DOC.brief_summary: Study to investigate the safety and efficacy of long-term daily use of JARDIANCE® Tablets in Japanese patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Daily Use of JARDIANCE® Tablets in Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Male and female Japanese patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus who have never been treated with JARDIANCE® Tablets before the enrolment Exclusion criteria:
